reviews.comments: Todo perfecto! Oscar siempre muy atento y responsivo. El departamento inmaculado y la ubicación excelente para estar tranquilo y cómodo. Recomiendo al 100%

Departamento cómodo y limpio, tal como se ve en las fotos. Tanto Oscar como el chico que nos recibió fueron muy atentos y amables. Fuimos en auto por lo que no sé cómo es la ubicación con respecto al transporte público. No comimos ahí ni usamos la cocina por lo que tampoco puedo opinar sobre esto, pero se veía muy bien equipada.
Departamento excelente, espacioso, lindo , moderno, muy buena atención . Muy recomendable
Excelente lugar, limpio, prolijo, bien equipado, detalles cuidados. Muy buena ubicación y lindo barrio. Oscar  muy buen anfitrión y Alfio un excelente ayudante. Lugar totalmente recomendable.
Genial!!

El departamento esta muy bien ubicado, cercano a comercios y gastronomía, un super a 2 cuadras.
El departamento es muy confortable, cómodo, diseño y decoración excelente!!!
Es tal cual lo muestra en la página.
Oscar muy buen anfitrión, como tambien Alfio estuvo atento a todas nuestras necesidades.
Indudablemente los volveriamos a elegir y es altamente recomendable!!!!

El apartamento es super cómodo, silencioso, en un bello barrio céntrico,muy bien ubicado. Muy luminoso, con detalles de diseño y mejor equipado. Recomendable.
Oscar y su asistente Alfio nos hicieron muy agradable la estadía con sobriedad y mucha eficacia.
Gracias por todo. Excelente lugar y atención. Volvería.
Departamento excepcional, con todos los servicios y comodidades. Lo recomiendo como una de las mejores opciones para alojarse en el centro de Mendoza

La residencia es tal cual se ve en las fotos. Quedamos muy contento y contamos con todas las comodidades. Oscar super atento en todo. Como así también Alfio. Muchas gracias a los dos. Y éxitos. Nos vemos pronto.
La estadía en el departamento fue excelente. Hermoso, con todo lo que necesitas y más!. Óscar siempre atento y disponible. El lugar súper tranquilo, cerca de bares y restaurantes. Muy recomendable!!!

El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos, se encuentra en una zona segura y a pocas cuadras de la calle Aristides donde se encuentran todos los bares más pintorescos de la ciudad. Es un departamento ideal para cocinar y pasar el rato. Tiene todos lo utensilios que imagines y más. La verdad que quedé encantado con el lugar y la atención de ambos, tanto de Oscar como Ailin que siempre estuvieros dispuestos a pasarnos información cuando se la pedimos. En fin, muy recomendable! volveria a ir sin dudarlo

Desde el primer momento tanto Óscar cómo Ailín fueron muy atentos y estuvieron siempre a nuestra disposición. El departamento es realmente increíble; amplio, limpio y está totalmente equipado. Si bien no se encuentra en el centro, vale totalmente la pena. Sin duda volveremos!
Un lugar muy elegante. Lleno de espacio con todo lo necesario para pasar un rato tranquilo.

Desde el primer momento que reservé Oscar se comunicó conmigo para ponerse a disposición de lo que necesitara, incluso con recomendaciones de lugares para visitar. El departamento es tal cual se ve en fotos, incluso no deja de sorprenderte hasta en los mínimos detalles. La cocina es completísima, con vajilla de primer calidad además de todos los electrodomésticos disponibles.    El barrio es de estilo residencial, muy tranquilo y cerca de todo (Super a dos cuadras, Parque y calle Arístides a cuatro).

El departamento de Oscar es más impactante al verlo que en las fotos, es tal cual se lo ve. Se encuentra en una zona tranquila, residencial, a 5 cuadras. En la Av Arístides, lugar de una completa movida gastronómica. 
Desde 48 ha antes de.la llegada  y 48 hs del retiro del depto Oscar estuvo conectado conmigo. 
Bárbara  nos recibió entregandonos el departamento, también atenta a nuestra llegada.

Tuve un inconveniente bastante importante,  alquilé el depto de Oscar, por las foto q me resultaron interesantes y porque tenia cochera.  Nunca dejamos el auto en la calle por eso siempre busco hospedaje con cochera.  Pues cuando llego Oscar no estaba,  estaba de vacaciones,  dejó a Mónica para que nos reciba y mi sorpresa fue q, no q se haya ido de vacaciones  sino q haya dejado su auto en el  estacionamiento q nos correspondía,  por lo q no tuve estacionamiento los dos  días. La primera noche lo dejamos dentro del edificio pero en un lugar q no correspondía,  la segunda noche lo tuvimos q dejar en una Ypf a 5 cuadras.  Aparte de no ser lo pactado,  dejar la camioneta fuera en una estación de servicio se largó una lluvia increíble q no me dejó dormir desde las 2:00, cuando me tenía q levantar a las 4:00!!! Una noche de terror, todo porque el Sr,Assandri no cumplió con parte de su contrato.  Me da mucha pena todo lo que sucedió,  me siento estafada y aunque el depto es muy lindo no lo recomendaría en absoluto porque nunca se hizo cargo por lo no cumplido! ! Al final me pidió disculpas,  pero considero q son cosas q no se hacen.  Solicito un resarcimiento económico por no haber cumplido parte del contrato.

Divino el departamento de Oscar, muy bien ubicado. Nos sentimos como en casa, no faltaba nada y Oscar fue tan amable de buscarnos en el aeropuerto y darnos unas cuantas recomendaciones para disfrutar de todas las opciones que tiene Mendoza.

Muy buena predisposción de Oscar en todo lo concerniente a nuestra estadía y excelente trato de Mónica quien nos entregó el depto. Muy buen barrio, cercano a principales áreas de esparcimiento de la ciudad. El departamento tal cual las fotos, inclusive mas amplio de lo que se apreciaba, muy agradable y bien equipado!, además el edificio muy tranquilo. Super recomendable, gente copada!

Departamento perfectamente equipado y muy cómodo. Tiene todo lo necesario, tal como se ve en las fotos. Tanto la sala como el cuarto son muy amplios, tanto que no se llega a apreciar en las fotos. Linda zona residencial, absolutamente tranquila y silenciosa a toda hora del día. 
Supermercado bien provisto a dos cuadras y media, frente al cual hay un restaurant, la av. Arístides con toda la movida nocturna se encuentra a cinco o seis cuadras. 
Tiene cocina completa, heladera con freezer, cafetera eléctrica, microondas, equipo de audio, DirecTV, lavarropas, vajilla completísima. Todo en perfecto estado.
El garage cubierto es un plus para quien se maneja en auto.
Pasamos muy linda estadía, el departamento asegura un descanso perfecto. Aunque todas las instalaciones están muy bien, la cama y la ducha merecen una mención especial.-
Volveremos sin dudarlo.

Hola! el departamento de Oscar es muy lindo, amplio, cómodo y luminoso. Mónica, la señora que nos recibió es amorosa y servicial. El departamento está muy bien ubicado y el barrio es precioso.
Gracias!
Excelente todo. La ubicación,  la atención de Oscar y Monica. El depto es igual que en las fotos o mejor. Super espacioso, luminoso y lindo. Super super recomendable

El departamento queda muy cerca de la Aristides lo cual hace muy fácil poder llegar a los bares y restaurantes! El departamento es tal cual se lo describe y cuenta con todas las facilidades para cocinar y poder disfrutar del lugar. Fue una muy buena elección y sin dudas volveríamos nuevamente.

El departamento está impecable. Superó nuestras expectativas ampliamente. Oscar y Monica estuvieron muy atentos. Recomiendo 100%. Esta cerca del centro, pero en un barrio residencial, por lo cual hay mucha tranquilidad.

Hermoso departamento, para sentirse como en casa. Totalmente equipado, luminoso y espacioso. Muy bien ubicado, a unas cuadras del parque San Martín y de la calle Arístides, donde se concentran la mayoría de los bares y restaurantes a la noche. Oscar y Mónica son excelentes anfitriones, sumamente atentos ante cualquier necesidad, y muy gentiles. De volver a Mendoza, sin duda nos alojaríamos nuevamente aquí.

Mendoza  una cuidad maravillosa.  Oscar  un exelente anfitrión y su departamento un lujo , hermoso muy bien  ubicado , super confortable y de espacios  amplios. . Un lugar que  recomiendo para cualquier  visitante ...

Departamento cómodo y comunicado. Muy conveniente para ir al parque General San Martín o los restaurantes y bares en Arístides. Anfitrión muy atento y responsable. 

Comfortable and conveniently located apartment. Ideal location between large urban park and street with restaurants and bars. Attentive and responsible host.

El apartamento de Oscar es maravilloso! Muy iluminado, alegre y decorado, con todo lo necesario para cocinar y entretenerse en casa. Oscar es un excelente host estuvo pendiente desde antes mi llegada y durante mi estadía, siempre dispuesto a darme recomendaciones de todo tipo. Lo recomiendo 100%.  Disfruté mucho mi estaría en Mendoza. Gracias Oscar!
Excelente ubicación, un lugar ideal con todas las comodidades. Oscar y Alfio super detallistas.

Oscar tiene un excelente dpto. Con todo disponible. Esta en un barrio tranquilo y céntrico. Todo salio a la perfección. Muy buenos consejos del lugar sobre todo atento para contestar nuestras preguntas. 100% recomendable.

El departamento es perfecto, super equipado y excelente ubicación.  Oscar, Alfio y Ailin son sensacionales....los mejores anfitriones.
Totalmente recomendable.
Gracias por todo!!!
Era un departamento que cumplía con lo que describía.

El departamento está bien ubicado, moderno y tranquilo. 
Oscar fue atento y nos llevó a visitar el algunos lugares! 
La pasamos muy bien. Recomendamos este lugar!

El alojamiento en Mendoza no pudo ser mejor. Todo salio tal cual lo esperaba. El apartamento muy limpio, acogedor y está en un sector muy bueno para caminar. Recomiendo a todos los viajeros este departamento pues sin duda en mi próximo viaje a Mendoza me alojare en él. Muchas gracias por todo y me senti como en casa.

El apartamento de Oscar, es muy lindo, bien equipado y ubicado. 
Todo en perfecto orden y limpio. Muy buen recibimiento. Lo recomiendo totalmente.
El departamento de Oscar es muy bonito y esta muy bien ubicado, tiene todo lo necesario para sentirte como en casa! Totalmente recomendado

Un apartamento en una zona residencial y tranquila, a pocas cuadras de la Arístides Villanueva, calle en donde hay cafés, restaurantes y tiendas.  Monica esta siempre a las órdenes y lista para ayudar.

Pasamos  una maravillosa estadía  en Mendoza,  el apartamento  es muy cómodo, amplio, bien dotado  y limpio. Las imágenes son tal cual la realidad. Oscar  y Mónica  estuvieron  permanentemente  pendientes de nosotros, nos sentimos  como  en casa. La distancia al centro se puede hacer en taxi por poco precio y el parque San Martín está muy cerca.  La calle aristides es solo a 4 cuadras y está llena de restaurantes  y bares. La fiesta de la vendimia estuvo muy linda.

Lindo departamento, con excelentes espacios, muy luminoso y bien ubicado. El departamento está muy bien equipado, lleno de utensilios que demuestran preocupación por hacer la estadía más placentera.
Mónica y Oscar son muy buenos anfitriones, flexibles, amables y siempre disponibles para atender cualquier necesidad que surja.

Gracias Oscar y Carina por la estadía. El departamento estaba muy limpio y acogedor. El barrio muy seguro y bonito como siempre. A pesar de reservar a última hora, fui muy bien recibido y todo impecable.  Wi Fi funcionando muy bien, cocina, baño, agua caliente,  perfectos.

El departamento de Oscar es amplio, muy limpio todo, luminoso, con un lindo sol de la mañana.  Su ubicación fue muy buena para el objetivo de mi viajes.  Tal como se ve en las fotos. El agua caliente y la ducha funcionaron a la perfección. 

Oscar es un excelente anfitrión, atento a tus necesidades, es muy colaborativo. Gracias Oscar por todo.

Preferí viajar al centro en taxi que es económico, rápido  y confortable ( 20 a 30 $AR ).  Cerca hay un muy buen supermercado y variados negocios de barrio muy agradables.

Excelente departamento. Muy bonito , limpio y con todas las comodidad. Óscar y Carina estuvieron sumamente pendiente de nosotros. El poder usar las Bicis por la ciudad fue grandioso. Recomendado totalmente

El departamento de Oscar fue muy cómodo, de mucho estilo, perfectamente equipado, 100% apto a lo que buscábamos. Está ubicado en un barrio seguro, residencial y tranquilo. Hay de todo cerca, supermercado, farmacia, bares, etc. Además, se puede perfectamente caminar al centro (30 min aprox). 
Con Oscar tuvimos un anfitrión excelente, muy preocupado de nuestro bienestar y siempre dispuesto a ayudarnos. Nos apoyó mucho más allá de lo que podíamos haber esperado. La comunicación con el fue sumamente fácil. Oscar es una persona muy simpática que tiene muchas historias que contar. Gracias por todo Oscar!!

Oscar por lejos el mejor anfitrión que nos podía tocar en esta nuestra primera experiencia en Airbnb, su preocupación en todo momento nos dio la tranquilidad y seguridad que necesitábamos para nuestro viaje, las fotos del depa no hacen justicia, ya que el llegar nos encontramos con mucho mejor, cómodo, limpio, a pasos de todo, estacionamiento privado y ademas con opción de bicicletas para esas mañanas de domingo. Por lejos una gran experiencia que esperamos repetir pronto.

Oscar muchas gracias, más que solo un anfitrión, un amigo.

Muchas gracias Enrique y Giannina

Estuvimos mi novia y yo en el departamento de Oscar por 4 días y nos fue fantástico. Desde el inicio fue todo muy tranquilo y él siempre estuvo dispuesto a ayudar con lo que necesitábamos. Desde el momento de la reserva del lugar tuvimos una buena comunicación sin ningun problema. El nos ayudó con el transporte desde el aeropuerto, nos indicó buenos restaurantes que están en la zona, nos ayudó con la reserva para una cena especial que tuvimos. Realmente fue todo muy bien conduzido. 

El departamento también es maravilloso. Tiene todo lo que necesitábamos y es extremamente agradable. Desde la ventana se puede ver el nacer del sol cuando el cielo está despejado. Está ubicado en una zona residencial bastante agradable y también está cerca de la principal zona de bares y restaurantes de Mendoza. El centro de la ciudad tampoco está lejos y se puede ir caminando. Oscar tampoco miente cuando dice que el parque está cerca del edificio. El parque San Martín está a 4 cuadras y es un lugar bastante bueno para pasear.

Everything perfect! 

Oscar and Mónica were hiper warm, helpful and informative regarding to directions, important phone numbers, places to go, weather conditions on the mountain and much more.  

The appartment is super comfortable, better than the description. The kitchen equipment was totally new and very complete. 

We won't doubt to go again to this appartment in a next trip to Mendoza.

Loved it!

Oscar's house is smartly located, you find yourself in a residential zone, yet very near from the park, and Aristides Villanueva street (a street full of restaurants, bars, and shops). Downtown is within walking distance as well, about 15 minutes.
The place is fully equipped with everything you imagine, and more! Bed linen, towels, Wi-Fi, Satellite TV, washing machine, and a very complete kitchen with all kinds of pots and pans. The pictures don’t do the place enough justice, it’s perfect.
Oscar proved to be an excellent host, he provided us with all the necessary information, he was always helpful and showed a great attitude.
Great Space at an excellent locations.  Everyone was very friendly!!

Oscar is a Good Host. Messaged us to make sure all was well & helped us if we needed any info. His place is comfortable and 1.5 blocks to the buses, fruits & Veggies, Vea Supermarket. (Large) & clearly walking distance to the central pedestrian walkway. Good Choice for Mendoza.
Beautiful, beautiful apartment. My flights were cancelled and then delayed, and Oscar was very accommodating with our arrival time. I wish I could I have stayed longer. Highly recommend
Great communication and lovely,  spacious apartment. Highly recommended.

O apartamento do Oscar é muito bom, localizado numa região tranquila e com muitos serviços por perto. É residencial e um pouco afastada do centro, mas próxima (6 quadras) da rua Aristide Villanueva. Não conhecemos o Oscar, mas a Rayen, que o ajuda com a hospedagens, foi ótima e fez e tudo para nos ajudar.

This apartment was perfectly located close to restaurants in Mendoza. We were not able to just hail a cab and had to order it, but that was ok. The only possible downside was barking dogs, but that subsided. The TV worked well
A lovely stylish apartment in the City of Mendoza. Within walking distance of restaurants and shops in the city. Well recommended for couples.

Oscar’s apartment is a great, quiet, restful place. It is in a nice  location only a few blocks from the park. There is a grocery store close by as well as many cafes, restaurants, and small markets. Oscar was very easy to communicate with and provided suggestions of things to do and places to visit. Having laundry inside the apartment was wonderful. WiFi was fast and consistent.

Simple space with a great location in Mendoza. Oscar and Alfio were extremely responsive when we arrived and throughout our stay. This apartment is located in a very nice neighborhood in Mendoza, which allows you a more personalized experience while visiting. You are just steps away from great cafes, restaurants, and shops, and the apartment has all of the basic amenities you need.  I highly recommend this place to anyone who is looking to stay in Mendoza.

Nice apartment in a good location.  My only real complaint, which is a critical one, was the constant barking of a neighbor's dog.  I was given this off the street apartment was quiet but was anything but as the barking was all day and all night.  The prevented any peaceful times and should be disclosed before renting.

I also asked to check out at 0700 and to have the manager meet me.  They refused and had me drop the keys in an unsecured mailbox.  Later I was accused of losing the key to the patio door (which was never there).  I stayed for one month and think it is reasonable to have a 0700 check out with a person present to prevent any issues.

If noise isn't an issue for you, this is a good choice.

Apartamento muito bom, amplo com um ótimo custo x benefício. Bairro residencial, muito tranquilo e poucos minutos de caminhada da principal rua turística de Mendoza. Deve-se ter como essencial um chip local (não se esqueça de registrar junto a operadora) para ligações, já que na área, por ser residencial, não se encontram táxis com facilidade e Mendoza ainda não tem Uber ou similar. Recomendadíssimo!
If you want to be close to the scrip, but in a quiet neighborhood than this is the place to choose!

Great location ! Dinning only 1/2 mile away, grocery store 1/4 mile away . Very quite, safe neighborhood! Oscar and his team will help you any way you need. The apartment looks just like the pictures. When I come back to Mendoza , this is where I will be !!!

O apartamento é muito lindo e completo, a cozinha tem muitos acessórios que permitem botar (URL HIDDEN) culinários para funcionar :) a poltrona no quarto é ótima para longos períodos de trabalho. O local é exatamente como nas fotos (até melhor), o nascer do sol no quarto é muito lindo, recomendamos o apartamento sem dúvida alguma! :)
The host canceled this reservation 40 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Oscar's apartment was just as advertised. Quiet and close to many restaurants and grocery store. 

The apartment was fully stocked with more than we needed. 

Alfio greeted us for check in and showed us everything. He also was a big help by calling a cab for us the night before we checked out so we wouldn't have to worry about transportation to the airport. 

The hot water went out after a windy night and Oscar came up 10 minutes after our text to fix the problem. 

Thanks again!!
A clean and comfortable place for visiting the city, the neighbourhood is quiet and tree shaded.
Very nice apartment, exactly as pictured. Quiet neighborhood about 15-20min walk from downtown and major restaurants. The host and his staff are extremely responsive and helpful.

We had a great time in Mendoza - thank's to the apartment and to Oscar and his supporters! Nice apartment, fully equipped, everything you need, a lot of space for two people and really comfortable! 10 min walk to Villanueva, where the bars and restaurants are, supermarket aorund the corner. Two bikes to rent. Oscar and his team Alfio and Ramiro helped us perfectly, all three were very friendly and the communication was fantastic. If you go to Mendoza, we highly recommend Oscar's apartment!
Béatrice & Ole

Apartment is very nice and well equipped. Everything good except that the host didn't told us when the check out is. When i asked him,he told me that it would be better if we wen't out from the apartment as early as we can
Unprofessional...

I spent one night in Mendoza with my mother.
It was perfect !! The flat is comfortable, full equiped and well located. 
And oscar is very nice. I was coming from Valparaiso by bus, and he has been very flexible for the check in.
I recommand !!

This apartment was absolutely perfect. Oscar and Ailin were so helpful and accommodating in the days (and even months) leading up to our visit and made sure we had everything we needed throughout our stay. The apartment itself is beautiful and was spotless upon arrival. It's also in a wonderful location - about a 5 minute walk from countless bars and restaurants and 6 or 7 minutes from the park. I would recommend this place in a heartbeat!
Très bon séjour passé dans l'appartement d'oscar. Les photos sont fidèles au lieu. Nous avons par ailleurs été bien accueilli à notre arrivée et bien documenté sur les attractions de Mendoza.
ambiente spazioso e comodo, il quartiere è tranquillo abbastanza vicino alla strada principale dei ristoranti. Lo consiglio!

Oscar was very responsive and even though we didn't meet him in person. Ailin, who met us when we arrived was very helpful with providing us with tour and restaurants recommendations.

The location is good but not the best, we didn't know any better as this was our first time in Mendoza. 
My husband and I love walking so it wasn't an issue for us but if you don't want to walk about 20-30 minutes to great restaurants, then I would suggest getting a place a bit more central.

At night I would suggest getting a taxi instead of walking.

We absolutely loved our time at Oscars apartment. It was spacious sunny modern with beautiful artifacts and art works. Impeccably clean. The fully equipped kitchen was a joy. The apartment had everything you could need including perfect Wi-Fi. Just a short walk to the main street of restaurants and bars, also the central park/lake. Oscar was an amazing host from meet & greet to farewell. Offering bicycles, local info and was always on hand if we had any queries. We even enjoyed socialising with him, his command of English was a bonus. Highly recommended!
Oscar was an excellent and attentive host! His bikes are great and he helped orient ourselves to the area. I highly recommend Oscar's listings.

The apartment was clean and well located. The place is in a quiet area close to the city center. The rooms are spacious and have all you might need to stay a week or longer. Oscar was very kind and provided in person all the necessary information about his place and the neighborhood.
Excelente localização e estrutura do apto....recomendo a todos

Oscar was a great host. The apartment is perfect and in a great location. We were met by a friend as Oscar was away but he communicated everything before the day of arrival so it was all very smooth. He also helped arrange a transfer from the airport which was great for us to get straight on to visiting the city. I can't recommend Oscar and his apartment highly enough.

Oscar was a great host. The apartment is perfect and in a great location. We were met by a friend as Oscar was away but he communicated everything before the day of arrival so it was all very smooth. He also helped arrange a transfer from the airport which was great for us to get straight on to visiting the city. I can't recommend Oscar and his apartment highly enough.

O apartamento é localizado em uma região residencial e muito agradável, onde nos sentimos seguros até mesmo em caminhadas à noite. Há facilidade para transporte público, supermercado e outras comodidades úteis para quem está (URL HIDDEN) uma pequena caminhada já é possível chegar à Av. Villanueva Aristides, onde encontramos os restaurantes mais interessantes da cidade. Também é muito fácil chegar no parque General San Martín, onde foi muito bom fazer uma passeio e aproveitar um dia de sol no meio do inverno.
Há necessidade de uma caminhada um pouco maior para chegar ao centro, o que para mim é apenas uma oportunidade para flanar pela cidade, observar a arquitetura e e encontrar lugares menos turísticos. De qualquer forma, não faltam opções para quem preferir ônibus ou táxi.
O apartamento é confortável e bem decorado. Encontramos as acomodações bem arrumadas e com roupas de cama e toalhas limpas e agradáveis, além de uma cozinha bem equipada.
Não tivemos o prazer de conhecer o Oscar no momento da nossa chegada ao apartamento. Contudo, isso não o impediu de se fazer presente o tempo todo. Foi um anfitrião dedicado, que nos ajudou em todas as etapas da viagem, desde o planejamento até seu fim. Suas orientações foram muito úteis para definirmos os passeios à vinícolas e a nossa ida à Penitentes.
Além disso, excedeu nossas expectativas e se ofereceu a ajudar na procura de uma de nossas malas que foi perdida pela Aerolineas Argentinas.

Em resumo: A experiência no apartamento foi maravilhosa!!!!

Olguita and Willy were awesome! They were so welcoming, friendly, and hospitable. Olguita even made us fresh masitas (ham and cheese fritters more or less) and a traditional hot chocolate drink from Columbia. The close location to the airport and their friendly nature makes this place hard to beat. The fact that they will pick you up and take you to the airport is an added bonus! Highly recommend these guys!

O anfitrião é muito simpático, prestativo, queria consertar os aparelhos que estavam com defeito, porém, quando estamos de férias não queremos ter que nos preocupar com esse tipo de problema. O mais grave dessa experiência foi receber um esfregão e um balde no último dia, apesar de termos pago taxa de limpeza. ACHEI ABSOLUTAMENTE INAPROPRIADO O ANFITRIÃO SUPOR QUE EU FARIA UMA FAXINA NO APARTAMENTO DELE NO MEU ÚLTIMO DIA DE FÉRIAS.
reviews.response: Adriana mi disculpas si esto fue mal interpretado. Yo deje eso porque se me había quedado en otro departamento, y siempre esta por si tienen algún inconveniente y lo necesitan, espero quede aclarado. Despues del check out controle el micro ondas y funcionaba perfectamente, solo que se debe entrar directamente en los números con el tiempo y no donde dice TIEMPO/TIME, que es el reloj. Saludos y disculpas nuevamente por no habernos entendido bien.

reviews.comments: My husband and I had the most amazing time in Mendoza, Argentina. Oscar and his team were a huge part of that. They all went above and beyond to make sure that we had the best time, and that we did! His team organized day tours for us, transportation, and recommended many local restaurants for us to dine at. I would definitely stay here again! The flat is large and very up to date with amenities. Also, it is in a great part of the city.

Great spacious flat in a nice neighbourhood close to the main eating street. We never met Oscar personally but he was always available to help. His friend Monica met us at the flat and helped us out the whole trip. Definitely recommend!

Ficamos hospedados por 1 semana nesse ótimo apartamento, muito espaçoso, equipado e decorado. A recepção foi maravilhosa, apesar do nosso enorme atraso na chegada.
A localização não é no centro, mas muito próximo do parque San Martin, ótimo para caminhadas, e a algumas quadras da Rua Aristides Villeneuve, que possui movimento noturno com muitos bares e restaurantes. As ruas do bairro não são muito movimentadas ou bem iluminadas, mas não nos sentimos inseguros.
Recomendo e voltaria ao apartamento em outras oportunidades, foram ótimo momentos que passamos em Mendoza.

A spacious and open flat which is perfect for a relaxing stay in Mendoza. The kitchen is well equipped for all cooking needs, and having a washing machine is a bonus on a long trip! The flat is slightly further away from the centre than some, about a half hour walk, but the area is very leafy and friendly. Both Monica and Oscar are really friendly and helpful, couldn't have asked for more.

Martin and I spent 4 nights in this apartment ; we really liked the apartment which was  pleasant, spacious and airy, and displayed a nice sense of design (featuring furniture designed and made by Oscar).  Oscar and his assistant Monica, were both super friendly and helpful  in many ways (their English is much better than our Spanish), and we had the unique opportunity to spend a social evening with Oscar which was delightful.  We enjoyed our trip to the thermal baths (which Oscar helped arrange) and our day with Mendoza Wine Camp.  The apartment, and these excursions highly recommended.

We were welcomed graciously by our hostess Monica. She gave us a comprehensive tour of the sunny and spacious apartment. The kitchen was adequately equipped for our cooking needs. Plenty of room for our luggage and the storage of our clothes. AC worked fine. Nice to have a clothes washer and also a clothes drying rack on the service porch. The building felt very secure. The residential neighborhood was convenient to walk to numerous restaurants and a supermarket, too. And just two blocks away was a perfect street for cab-catching. We had a fine stay in the apartment and would recommend it to others who waould like to enjoy Mendoza.

We had such a wonderful time staying at Oscar's apartment!  Monica met us even though our flights were very delayed and we got in later at night, and was so welcoming.  Everything was clean and the apartment exactly as expected.  The neighborhood felt very safe, and I was comfortable running early every morning (even when it was dark).  The park was closeby, but mostly I ran up to the Plaza Indepencia and that area, and it was very easy to get to (probably a 20-30 minute walk otherwise). Restaurants and shopping (as well as a supermarket) very close as well. Monica and Oscar arranged for us to have transport to and from the airport as well, and it was very easy and seamless. We would stay here again in a heartbeat!

We had a great week in Mendoza. This is a wonderful apartment in a lovely quiet neighborhood. We felt right at home here, the apartment has everything you could possibly need and is extremely spacious. It is 5 mins walk from the lovely park, and 10 mins walk to the main nightlife street.
We couldn't have been welcomed better by Monica, who is a lovely lady, very friendly and helpful. She gave us lots of information, advice and explained everything in the apartment to us, and kindly arranged a taxi to take us to the airport. Oscar was also very friendly and helpful when we met him.
If we visit Mendoza again we would stay here without hesitation- do not look any further!

My fiancé and I loved our stay at Oscar's AirBNB!! He offered to pick us up at the airport, which was extremely helpful and less stressful.  Once we arrived to the apartment, Monica was there to greet us.  She showed us around, and also gave us maps of Mendoza.  Monica gave us her number on (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), and she was very helpful whenever we asked her a question.  She even called us cabs when we asked her to during our stay in Mendoza.  The apartment had everything we needed, very clean, great decorating, and spacious.  The neighborhood was very safe, and a great location. We were close to bars, restaurants, and mercados.  Also, we were able to walk to the park everyday from the apartment (beautiful park).  Oscar was  a great host and very helpful as well.  We would highly recommend this AirBNB!!

Foi incrível a dedicação e o suporte prestado pelo sr. Oscar. Algo que nunca esperei... uma experiência memorável. Desde que a reserva foi confirmada o sr Oscar foi atencioso, fornecendo informações precisas sobre a cidade de Mendoza e cercanias. Se mostrou preocupado quando da obstrução do passo de fronteira Chile/Argentina, oferecendo seu apartamento em Santiago como resolução do problema... além disso, nos acompanhou, via (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), durante todo o período, da reserva até o retorno ao Brasil. O apartamento em Mendoza é impecável!!!! Exatamente como descrito no anúncio. Fomos recebidos pela sra Mônica, outra pessoa muito simpática e prestativa. Sempre atenta a todos os detalhes durante nossa estadia...  Enfim, a hospedagem na casa do Oscar foi uma experiência excelente. Recomendo a todos!

O apartamento é ótimo! A Monica, que foi quem nos recebeu, é um doce! Super prestativa e acessível. O apartamento é bem espaçoso e limpo. A cozinha é grande e super equipada. Tudo é exatamente como nas fotos. A localização é boa, perto de um supermercado e em um bairro residencial tranquilo. No entanto, é longe do centro e ir e voltar a pé da rua Aristides pode ser um pouco cansativo a noite, principalmente depois de fazer passeios e caminhar o dia inteiro no calor. Nada que não se resolva com um taxi, que tem tarifas razoavelmente baratas.
Oscar's Wohnung war schön und sehr gut gelegen. Wir haben uns dort sehr wohl gefühlt. Eine sichere und ruhiges Wohngebiet.

Oscar's apartment in Mendoza was great! It was spacious, clean, in a great location, and with the most comfortable bed. Oscar connected us with Atilio, who helped us tour the vineyards nearby. Would definitely recommend this apartment.

The apartment was clean and looked as portrayed in the pictures. There was a great view from the windows. Monica was very friendly and helpful in the check in and out process and very flexible on times. We rented the bikes from Oscar which were very nice and we'll maintained, however we never used them because we found we could walk to all of the plazas without trouble. Very nice neighborhood. Good utilities in the kitchen. Washer worked well once we translated and figure out the best cycles, no dryer but there is a rack to hang clothes on. Artillo gave a lot of great advice and helped to set up all of our driver transportation at great prices. Definitely would stay here again.

Excelente apartamento em Mendoza, exatamente como mostra nas fotos. Bastante espaçoso e muito bem localizado, a 2 quadras de um mercado e 3 quadras da avenida cheia de restaurantes. Conta com todas as facilidades para tornar a estada perfeita.
Oscar foi um excelente anfitrião, sempre me respondendo rapidamente e com bastante precisão.
Monica é muito amável e estava pontualmente nos aguardando tanto na chegada quanto na saída. Recomendo bastante e certamente ficaria hospedada ali novamente.

This was a fascinating stay. We arrived and were greeted by the hosts assistant who gave us a 30 second tour of the place. The accommodation was fine, well presented and met our requirements. During our stay, due to an accident a single wine glass was broken. We immediately notified the host and apologized. Upon checking out we cleaned the apartment as if it was our own. Wanting to contribute, we provided our remaining pesos towards the replacement of the wine glass. 

Later the host Oscar and his assistant Monica contacted us accusing us of breaking multiple glasses and other equipment we had not used. They made accusation after accusation. They demanded 40US dollars and threatened to get Airbnb involved. We had to contact Airbnb for support as the host was trying to extort more money out of us after we had paid a significant amount for the accommodation. A stressful end to a lovely stay in Mendoza. If you are seeking accommodation don't stay with this host. He might blame you for the next thing he needs repaired in his apartment. Dodgy host!!!

We had a great stay! The apartment is very spacious, quiet, and comfortable. It's within walking distance to many bars, restaurants, and a very nice park. Monica helped us with exchanging money and arranging transportation. I would definitely stay here again.

From the moment we arrived our host made sure that we had all the information and phone numbers that we needed. Monica (who works with Oscar) went beyond what was expected to help us be comfortable. She even hooked us up with (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) numbers for many other services (bicycles, transportation, etc).

The place itself is 5 blocks from a very popular street in Mendoza that has several bars and restaurants.

I would definitely recommend this place!

Oscar was very welcoming and made our stay easy and stress free.  
The apartment is gorgeous, well fitted out and located close to an amazing park. It's about a 20min walk into town. 
I'd definitely recommend staying here if you like nice, quiet, beautiful green areas.
